00061 /********************** toolbox operator *********************/
00062 
00063 static int toolbox_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00064 {
00065     bScreen *sc= CTX_wm_screen(C);
00066     SpaceButs *sbuts= CTX_wm_space_buts(C);
00067     PointerRNA ptr;
00068     uiPopupMenu *pup;
00069     uiLayout *layout;
00070 
00071     RNA_pointer_create(&sc->id, &RNA_SpaceProperties, sbuts, &ptr);
00072 
00073     pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, "Align", ICON_NONE);
00074     layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00075     uiItemsEnumR(layout, &ptr, "align");
00076     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00077 
00078     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void BUTTONS_OT_toolbox(wmOperatorType *ot)
00082 {
00083     /* identifiers */
00084     ot->name = "Toolbox";
00085     ot->description = "Display button panel toolbox";
00086     ot->idname = "BUTTONS_OT_toolbox";
00087     
00088     /* api callbacks */
00089     ot->invoke = toolbox_invoke;
00090     ot->poll = ED_operator_buttons_active;
00091 }

00093 /********************** filebrowse operator *********************/
00094 
00095 typedef struct FileBrowseOp {
00096     PointerRNA ptr;
00097     PropertyRNA *prop;
00098 } FileBrowseOp;
00099 
00100 static int file_browse_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00101 {
00102     FileBrowseOp *fbo= op->customdata;
00103     ID *id;
00104     char *str, path[FILE_MAX];
00105     const char *path_prop= RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "directory") ? "directory" : "filepath";
00106     
00107     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, path_prop)==0 || fbo==NULL)
00108         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00109     
00110     str= RNA_string_get_alloc(op->ptr, path_prop, NULL, 0);
00111 
00112     /* add slash for directories, important for some properties */
00113     if (RNA_property_subtype(fbo->prop) == PROP_DIRPATH) {
00114         char name[FILE_MAX];
00115         
00116         id = fbo->ptr.id.data;
00117 
00118         BLI_strncpy(path, str, FILE_MAX);
00119         BLI_path_abs(path, id ? ID_BLEND_PATH(G.main, id) : G.main->name);
00120         
00121         if (BLI_is_dir(path)) {
00122             str = MEM_reallocN(str, strlen(str)+2);
00123             BLI_add_slash(str);
00124         }
00125         else
00126             BLI_splitdirstring(str, name);
00127     }
00128 
00129     RNA_property_string_set(&fbo->ptr, fbo->prop, str);
00130     RNA_property_update(C, &fbo->ptr, fbo->prop);
00131     MEM_freeN(str);
00132 
00133 
00134     /* special, annoying exception, filesel on redo panel [#26618] */
00135     {
00136         wmOperator *redo_op= WM_operator_last_redo(C);
00137         if (redo_op) {
00138             if (fbo->ptr.data == redo_op->ptr->data) {
00139                 ED_undo_operator_repeat(C, redo_op);
00140             }
00141         }
00142     }
00143 
00144     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00145 
00146     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00147 }
00148 
00149 static int file_browse_cancel(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00150 {
00151     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00152     op->customdata= NULL;
00153 
00154     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00155 }
00156 
00157 static int file_browse_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00158 {
00159     PointerRNA ptr;
00160     PropertyRNA *prop;
00161     FileBrowseOp *fbo;
00162     char *str;
00163 
00164     if (CTX_wm_space_file(C)) {
00165         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't activate a file selector, one already open");
00166         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00167     }
00168 
00169     uiFileBrowseContextProperty(C, &ptr, &prop);
00170 
00171     if (!prop)
00172         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00173 
00174     str= RNA_property_string_get_alloc(&ptr, prop, NULL, 0, NULL);
00175 
00176     /* useful yet irritating feature, Shift+Click to open the file
00177      * Alt+Click to browse a folder in the OS's browser */
00178     if (event->shift || event->alt) {
00179         PointerRNA props_ptr;
00180 
00181         if (event->alt) {
00182             char *lslash= BLI_last_slash(str);
00183             if (lslash)
00184                 *lslash= '\0';
00185         }
00186 
00187 
00188         WM_operator_properties_create(&props_ptr, "WM_OT_path_open");
00189         RNA_string_set(&props_ptr, "filepath", str);
00190         WM_operator_name_call(C, "WM_OT_path_open", WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, &props_ptr);
00191         WM_operator_properties_free(&props_ptr);
00192 
00193         MEM_freeN(str);
00194         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00195     }
00196     else {
00197         const char *path_prop= RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "directory") ? "directory" : "filepath";
00198         fbo= MEM_callocN(sizeof(FileBrowseOp), "FileBrowseOp");
00199         fbo->ptr= ptr;
00200         fbo->prop= prop;
00201         op->customdata= fbo;
00202 
00203         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, path_prop, str);
00204         MEM_freeN(str);
00205 
00206         /* normally ED_fileselect_get_params would handle this but we need to because of stupid
00207          * user-prefs exception - campbell */
00208         if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "relative_path")) {
00209             if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "relative_path")) {
00210                 /* annoying exception!, if were dealign with the user prefs, default relative to be off */
00211                 RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "relative_path", U.flag & USER_RELPATHS && (ptr.data != &U));
00212             }
00213         }
00214         WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00215 
00216         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00217     }
00218 }
00219 
00220 void BUTTONS_OT_file_browse(wmOperatorType *ot)
00221 {
00222     /* identifiers */
00223     ot->name = "Accept";
00224     ot->description = "Open a file browser, Hold Shift to open the file, Alt to browse containing directory";
00225     ot->idname = "BUTTONS_OT_file_browse";
00226     
00227     /* api callbacks */
00228     ot->invoke = file_browse_invoke;
00229     ot->exec = file_browse_exec;
00230     ot->cancel = file_browse_cancel;
00231 
00232     /* properties */
00233     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, 0, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH|WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00234 }
00235 
00236 /* second operator, only difference from BUTTONS_OT_file_browse is WM_FILESEL_DIRECTORY */
00237 void BUTTONS_OT_directory_browse(wmOperatorType *ot)
00238 {
00239     /* identifiers */
00240     ot->name = "Accept";
00241     ot->description = "Open a directory browser, Hold Shift to open the file, Alt to browse containing directory";
00242     ot->idname = "BUTTONS_OT_directory_browse";
00243 
00244     /* api callbacks */
00245     ot->invoke = file_browse_invoke;
00246     ot->exec = file_browse_exec;
00247     ot->cancel = file_browse_cancel;
00248 
00249     /* properties */
00250     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, 0, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_DIRECTORY|WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00251 }
